verses.plain: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. They are corrupt, they have done abominable works, there is none that doeth good.

tokens.t: The fool hath said in his heart,
no God. They are corrupt, they have done abominable works,

verses.plain: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.

tokens.t: looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand,

verses.plain: They are all gone aside, they are all together become filthy: there is none that doeth good, no, not one.

tokens.t: They are all gone aside, they are
none that doeth good, no, not one.

verses.plain: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread, and call not upon the LORD.

tokens.t: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people
they eat bread, and call not upon the

verses.plain: There were they in great fear: for God is in the generation of the righteous.

tokens.t: There were they in great fear: for God
in the generation of the righteous.

verses.plain: Ye have shamed the counsel of the poor, because the LORD is his refuge.

tokens.t: Ye have shamed the counsel of the poor, because the

verses.plain: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! when the LORD bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.

tokens.t: Oh that the salvation of Israel
bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice,
